name: Wansiri AI - How to Get Started with Data-Driven Crypto Basket Trading
description: Step-by-step guide to access and use Wansiri AI's proprietary Win Agents for basket trading of crypto pairs, integrated with Altrady.

step.name: Create Your Account
step.text: Sign up for a free Wansiri AI account and log in to start exploring the Win Agents dashboard.

itemListElement.text: Use a valid email address to receive important updates.

step.name: Set Up Altrady Webhook
step.text: Create an Altrady webhook bot to connect with Wansiri AI and enable real-time basket trading signals.

itemListElement.text: Ensure your webhook bot has appropriate permissions for trading actions.

step.name: Connect to Dashboard
step.text: Link your Altrady webhook bot to Wansiri Win Agents on the dashboard and start trading.

itemListElement.text: Check your dashboard regularly for real-time trading insights and performance metrics.

about.name: Wansiri AI
about.description: Wansiri AI offers proprietary Win Agents that model baskets of crypto pairs using advanced statistical modeling and backtesting. Access diversified, data-driven trading insights via a dashboard integrated with Altrady.
